actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To make technical changes to Public Law 81-874.

summary.text: Amends Federal law which provides impact aid to local educational agencies in areas affected by Federal activities to deem the United States to own Federal property, for purposes of such impact aid law, if such property met certain conditions prior to its transfer and if the Federal Government has: (1) transferred it to another non-taxable entity; and (2) placed specified use restrictions on it.

titles.title: To make technical changes to Public Law 81-874.
